thread.title: Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Date, Rituals And Significance Of This Sacred Lord Hanuman Jayanthi
thread.title_full: Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Date, Rituals And Significance Of This Sacred Lord Hanuman Jayanthi

author: @englishjagrannews
title: Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Date, Rituals And Significance Of This Sacred Lord Hanuman Jayanthi
text: - By [Kashish Rai](/authors/kashish-rai) - Published: Sat, 01 Jun 2024 12:30 PM (IST) - Source:JND Lord Hanuman's birthday is commemorated on Telugu Hanuman Jayanti. Telugu Hanuman Jayanti is an auspicious day that is observed by Lord Hanuman's devotees with great fervour and devotion. As per the Telugu calendar, this Hanuman Jayanti is observed on the Krishna Paksha Dashmi in the Hindu month of Jyeshtha. This year, Telugu Hanuman Jayanti is being observed on 1st June 2024. Telugu Hanuma Jayanti 2024: Date And Time - Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024 Date - 1st June 2024 - Dashami Tithi Begins - 7:24 AM, June 1, 2024 - Dashami Tithi Ends - 5:04 AM, June 2, 2024 Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Rituals Of This Sacred Day For believers, the Hanuman Jayanti celebration starts a 41-day spiritual journey on Chaitra Purnima. 'Hanuman Deeksha' is the period of time when devotees do daily devotion, repeat Hanuman mantras, and observe certain spiritual rituals. On the last day of the 41-day Deeksha, several Hanuman temples in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana host lavish celebrations. 'Sundar Kand', a revered Ramayan recital, is one of the centrepieces of these festivities. Chants of the "Hanuman Chalisa" and other potent Hanuman mantras, which laud the deity's strength and devotion, fill the temples. Telugu Hanuman Jayanti marks the birth anniversary of Lord Hanuman in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. (Image Source: Jagran English) On this day, those who worship Hanuman with genuine devotion get heavenly protection and have their difficulties removed from their lives. Rituals celebrating Telugu Hanuman Jayanti are thought to confer upon believers courage, power, and knowledge, representing the characteristics of Lord Hanuman himself. Through celebration and adherence to the specified rites, devotees are believed to call upon Lo Hanuman's blessings for a successful and trouble-free life. ALSO READ: [People Born On THESE 5 Dates Are Highly Inspiring And Champions At Overcoming Obstacles](https://english.jagran.com/spiritual/people-born-on-these-5-dates-are-highly-inspiring-and-champions-at-overcoming-obstacles-10163965) Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Puja Rituals Associated With This Day Devotees rise early on this day and begin their day with a holy bath. Then they burn a diya with desi ghee and set the idol of Lord Hanuman on an altar. Lord Hanuman receives offerings of sweets, flowers, garland, pan, and bhog prasad. One chants the Hanuman Chalisa. Subsequently, the devotees get the prasad. It is thought that those who observe Telugu Hanuman Jayanti with fervour would be endowed with strength, vitality, and power.
